data.persona: I am a donkey in the stable.  I smell badly.  I bray very loudly.
data.description:
You are in the Stable.
It's a plain wooden building that has survived many harsh seasons.  The floor of the stable is covered in hay and there's food and pieces of farm equipment stored inside.
There's a pitchfork, a building, a food, a hay, and a harness here.
The milkmaid and the barn cat are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I wish to greet my friend
data.mid_motivation: I can only communicate with animals and hope to hear tales of life outside the Stable
data.long_motivation: I wish to keep good relations with the animals of this farm so they do not attack me
